title: New Champion Idea
body:
Just a thought. If you're tired of hearing new champion ideas then don't read on.

So i was thinking, after looking at the store and seeing all the melee champions with swords. There are quite a few that seems appealing. Other than Yasuo. The other champions holding swords feel a bit out-dated. That's coming from someone who hasn't played for about a year and started playing again. Could we get a fire + sword combo going? Maybe tryndameres arch nemesis, or yasuos long-time rival. Who knows? It kind of fits in with their background considering tryndamere has ice in the back. If you want to lean towards Yasuo's side you can do a sort of "Too much wind snuffs out fire, but too much fire devours wind." Kind of thing... Just an idea. I just think it would be pretty fun to have a fire+sword combo and when I mean sword, I mean sword meaning greatsword or katana. Not one of those lame toothpicks that fiora uses or that broken "sword" riven uses. I'm talking about a big boi's sword like Tryndamere's or long and sleek like Yasuo's. One of the skills would be a combination of Yasuo's e and Riven's q. Just slashing and burning as you glide past enemies, of course with a CD. You get the gist.

Not trying to offend any Fiora mains or Riven mains, but foreal though. Make it happen. 

P.S. If there are similar posts to this, or a million of the same posts as this, then I apologize. BUT, that just means they REALLY need to make it happen. If a million people DEMAND it, then they should SUPPLY it. Riot would rake in the moneeehh and the players would rake in the enjoyment of a sword + flame combo.

replies.body:
passive - Flame swordsman: auto attacks burn through % of armor
q - Heavy cleave: Swings his sword in a large arc in front of him dealing damage and disrupting enemies, leaves the ground burning where he swung which deals magic damage to those who stand in it. 
w- Volcano: Smashes his sword into the ground and become immobile for 1 second during the animation. The ground erupts around him dealing magic damage to those hit and knocks them back and slows. 
e- Blaze a trail: Him and his flaming sword become a singular flame and dash a short distance, passing through enemies and terrain before reforming at the appointed location. Enemies that he passes through are stunned for one second. 
r- Super nova: Huge power emits from his sword and burns enemies around him for the duration supernova, enemies hit by the burst are blinded for half a second. While supernova is activated he gains attack speed. 

So many good combos can be done and played smartly.

easy

Big boy sword? Like Guts' in Berserk?

Oh wait, they already stole that with Trynd.
